name: iplookup
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool greip.
Tool description: Deploy AI-Powered modules to prevent payment fraud
API description: Perform an IP lookup using the RapidAPI IP Lookup service.

ip.description: The IP Address you want to lookup.

key.description: Your API Key. Each user has a unique API Key that can be used to access the API functions. If you don't have an account yet, please create new account first.
